item.description:
IBD Method Group

Please RSVP!

We are starting a Pre-Meeting Newbie class this month. It will focus on CANSLIM basics. If you are new to the CANSLIM Method, come at 6. If you are more advanced and want to skip the basics, come at 7.

Preparation for Newbies:Please bring to the meeting a copy of the Word document Review of the Level One Material. It can be found in our meetup.com Files area here. Also, if you can please print out another copy of the document for others who do not RSVP, that would be welcome.

This month's agenda:
  • CANSLIM Basics for Newbies Chris - 6-7pm - Chris Jones will do a summary of the CANSLIM terminology and go through Doug's List. Then he'll focus on one or two letters and use the chart to point highlight appropriate information.
    he'll run off some copies. he'll also reintroduce them to the site and walk the newcomers through some of the basic features. He will also recommend the books to the members. We expect to have some copies of the book "24 Lessons" to hand out. If you have one already, bring it.

  • 7-7:15 - Jeff Intro to main meeting
  • 7:15 - 8:00 - CANSLIM Screens - Peter has run 21 screens comprised of data he recorded from IBD for the month of May and to a lesser degree screens/data from DGO Custom Screen Wizard. He then went on to track the performance of these screens for the entire month of June with the assumption that all securities were bought at the close on 5/29 and sold after 1 week, 2 weeks and 6/30.. He included some indexes to see which equities beat, median gains, etc. He will going present my findings from this analysis.
  • 8:00-8:15 In-depth stock - Steve Weiser

    8:15 - 9:00 - Original CANSLIM Research - Mike Kinkead
  • Stock Picks - Jeff



Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.




  • We have our own Google Group - IBDLevels. This is a moderated discussion that is also an IBD centric Google Group and its home page says as much. Join it via this link: http://groups.google....

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: IBD Method Group - with Newbie Pre-Meeting Class
